title: LTC4 — 16 or Fewer Intermediate DD Beds — Data Dictionary (Draft)

license_number.description: Facility License Number (Section/Page: Sec I p.2)

address_zip.description: Facility Zip Code (Section/Page: Sec I p.2)

fein.description: Facility FEIN Number (Section/Page: Sec I p.2)

admission_restrictions.description: Admission Restrictions (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) Multi-select; include None Applicable

reg_agent_*.description: Registered Agent (Name/Address/CityStateZip/Phone) (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) Required if ownership requires RA

fte_*.description: Staffing FTEs (Admin, Physicians, DON, RN, LPN, Certified Aides, Other Health, Other Non-Health, Total) (Section/Page: Sec I p.3) Total auto

workweek_hours.description: Typical work week hours (full-time) (Section/Page: Sec I p.3)

census_jan1.description: Patients in facility on Jan 1, 2023 (Section/Page: Sec I p.3)

admissions_initial.description: Initial admissions during 2023 (Section/Page: Sec I p.3)

discharges_permanent.description: Permanent discharges during 2023 (Section/Page: Sec I p.3)

census_dec31.description: Patients in facility on Dec 31, 2023 (Section/Page: Sec I p.3) Calculated per instructions

beds_licensed_idd.description: Licensed Beds — Intermediate DD (12/31/2023) (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

beds_setup_idd.description: Beds Set Up — Intermediate DD (12/31/2023) (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

beds_peak_setup_idd.description: Highest One-Day Beds Set Up — Intermediate DD (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

beds_peak_occupied_idd.description: Highest One-Day Beds Occupied — Intermediate DD (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

beds_occupied_idd.description: Beds Occupied — Intermediate DD (12/31/2023) (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

days_total_idd.description: TOTAL PATIENT DAYS OF CARE 2023 — Intermediate DD (Section/Page: Sec I p.4)

residents_age_sex_*.description: Residents by Age/Sex — as of Dec 31 (Section/Page: Sec I p.4) Age bands as listed

residents_race_*.description: Residents by Racial Group — as of Dec 31 (Section/Page: Sec I p.5)

residents_eth_*.description: Residents by Ethnicity — as of Dec 31 (Section/Page: Sec I p.5)

residents_pay_*.description: Residents by Primary Payment — as of Dec 31 (Section/Page: Sec I p.5) Includes Charity Care

finance_*.description: Fiscal year, capex, revenues, charity cost (Section/Page: Sec II p.7-8) Same structure as LTC2

immun_*.description: Influenza/pneumonia policies and counts (Section/Page: Sec III p.9) Same as LTC2
